corridors.title: Dusty Hallway
corridors.flavor: Cobwebs drape from the ceiling; an ancient breeze stirs the dust.

corridors.title: Flooded Passage
corridors.flavor: Ankle-deep water ripples around your feet; distant dripping echoes.

corridors.title: Crumbled Archway
corridors.flavor: Rubble blocks part of the corridor; large stones have fallen from above.

corridors.title: Whispering Vines
corridors.flavor: Thick vines crawl across the walls, gently rustling as if whispering.

corridors.title: Torchlit Gallery
corridors.flavor: Old sconces still burn with magical torches, casting dancing shadows.

corridors.title: Mosaicked Hall
corridors.flavor: The floor is a colorful mosaic depicting mythical beasts. Some tiles are cracked.

corridors.title: Chilled Passage
corridors.flavor: A sudden drop in temperature; frost clings to the walls.

corridors.title: Sculpted Tunnel
corridors.flavor: Smooth, polished walls carved with swirling motifs. The floor slopes downward.

corridors.title: Murky Mist
corridors.flavor: A corridor filled with low-lying mist that clings to your ankles.

corridors.title: Twisting Passage
corridors.flavor: The corridor bends multiple times, making it easy to get disoriented.

rooms.title: Arcane Workshop
rooms.flavor: Tables cluttered with half-finished potions and runic scribbles.

rooms.title: Statue Chamber
rooms.flavor: Four statues line the walls, each depicting a legendary hero.

rooms.title: The Crypt
rooms.flavor: Rows of stone coffins in the walls; the air is stale and cold.

rooms.title: Alchemist’s Vault
rooms.flavor: Shelves of potions and swirling liquids in glass jars.

rooms.title: Summoning Circle
rooms.flavor: A chalk circle etched on the floor, candles flicker around the edges.

rooms.title: Collapsed Library
rooms.flavor: Rotting books and broken shelves; half the ceiling has caved in.

rooms.title: Beast Pen
rooms.flavor: Iron bars, straw on the floor, and a lingering animal musk.

rooms.title: Elemental Shrine
rooms.flavor: A stone dais with four elemental symbols (fire, water, air, earth).

rooms.title: Hall of Mirrors
rooms.flavor: Reflective panels line every wall. Distorted images swirl around you.

rooms.title: The Feasting Hall
rooms.flavor: A long table laden with dusty platters; a rotten smell lingers.

rooms.title: Spider Nest
rooms.flavor: Webs drape from the ceiling; the floor is sticky with silk.

rooms.title: Guardian Golem Room
rooms.flavor: A silent, stone golem stands in the center, inert… maybe.

rooms.title: Arcane Pool
rooms.flavor: A shimmering pool of magical water with runes around the edges.

rooms.title: Prison Cells
rooms.flavor: Iron bars and rusted locks. A few skeletons linger in old cells.

rooms.title: Throne Room
rooms.flavor: A dusty throne on a raised platform, tapestries of a forgotten king.

traps.title: Swinging Blades
traps.easy: One blade swings down; each hero rolls a die. On an odd roll, take 1 HP damage.
traps.medium: Blades swing from both sides; each hero rolls a die. On a 4 or lower, take 2 HP damage.
traps.hard: Multiple blades descend rapidly; each hero discards 1 card and takes 3 HP damage if they roll below a 5.

traps.title: Sticky Webs
traps.easy: Lose next turn unless you discard a card.
traps.medium: Heroes lose next turn and discard 1 card to escape.
traps.hard: Trapped for two turns unless you discard 2 cards or take 3 HP damage.

traps.title: Rolling Boulder
traps.easy: Dodge with a successful roll (4+ on a d6), or take 2 HP damage.
traps.medium: Each hero must discard a card and roll a 5+ to avoid 3 HP damage.
traps.hard: Heroes must roll a 6+ to escape; failure results in 4 HP damage and skipping next turn.

traps.title: Magical Curse Glyph
traps.easy: Disarm with an intelligence-based challenge; failure = -1 attack next turn.
traps.medium: Failure = 2 HP damage and discarding a card.
traps.hard: Curse siphons energy; take 3 HP damage and lose 1 action for the next two turns.

traps.title: Pit Trap
traps.easy: Roll a 3+ (d6) to avoid. Failure = 1 HP damage or skip next draw.
traps.medium: Roll a 4+ to avoid. Failure = 2 HP damage or skip next draw.
traps.hard: Roll a 5+ to avoid. Failure = 3 HP damage and skip next turn.

traps.title: Poison Darts
traps.easy: A weak dart trap; each hero takes 1 HP damage if triggered.
traps.medium: Enhanced poison darts; each hero takes 2 HP damage and discards 1 card.
traps.hard: Deadly darts; 3 HP damage, discard 1 card, and -1 penalty on next action.

traps.title: Fire Spout
traps.easy: A small burst of flames; take 1 HP damage or discard 1 card.
traps.medium: A stronger spout; take 2 HP damage or discard 1 card.
traps.hard: A scorching blast; take 3 HP damage and discard 2 cards.

traps.title: Collapsing Ceiling
traps.easy: Small debris falls; discard 1 card or take 1 HP damage.
traps.medium: Large chunks fall; discard 1 card or take 2 HP damage.
traps.hard: Ceiling crumbles heavily; discard 2 cards or take 3 HP damage.

puzzles.title: The Goblin’s Gate Riddle
puzzles.setupFlavor: A locked gate with a grinning goblin face carved into it. A riddle reads: 'I have towns, but no houses...What am I?'
puzzles.mechanic: If the kids guess correctly (answer: 'A map'), the gate unlocks. Wrong guesses trigger minor traps.
puzzles.randomize: Use different riddles each time. For younger kids, simpler riddles.

puzzles.title: The Three Levers of Fate
puzzles.setupFlavor: A wall with three levers labeled sun, moon, star. Pulling them in the correct order opens a door.
puzzles.mechanic: Correct sequence opens the door, wrong sequence triggers a small trap or penalty.

puzzles.title: The Colorful Crystals
puzzles.setupFlavor: Four pedestals of glowing crystals in different colors (red, green, blue, yellow).
puzzles.mechanic: Touch them in the correct order to unlock treasure. Wrong order deals mild damage.
puzzles.randomize: Roll or shuffle to decide the color order each session.

puzzles.title: The Singing Statues
puzzles.setupFlavor: Three robed statues, each with a musical note (la, ti, do, etc.). Pressing them in sequence is required.
puzzles.mechanic: Play the correct chord or get blasted by sound for small damage.
puzzles.randomize: Change which statue corresponds to which note each time.

puzzles.title: Hidden Animal Footprints
puzzles.setupFlavor: A dusty floor with footprints (wolf, snake, bear, bird). Only one track is safe.
puzzles.mechanic: Choose the correct footprints to cross safely. Wrong step triggers a minor trap.
puzzles.randomize: Roll a d4 to pick the correct animal track each game.

puzzles.title: The Runic Dial
puzzles.setupFlavor: A circular dial with six runes: sun, leaf, skull, sword, eye, coin. Only three correct runes open a door.
puzzles.mechanic: Align the correct runes in order to unlock or get trapped.
puzzles.randomize: Roll d6 thrice to decide the correct combo each time. Limited tries on higher difficulty.

puzzles.title: The Mirror Code
puzzles.setupFlavor: A magic mirror displays a 5-letter code backward. A riddle says: 'Speak me forward to pass.'
puzzles.mechanic: Identify the reversed word. Failure = mild penalty.
puzzles.randomize: Pick a new random word each session.

puzzles.title: The Four Fountains
puzzles.setupFlavor: Four colored water fountains (red, blue, green, clear). One is safe, others deal minor damage.
puzzles.mechanic: Guess or find clues to choose the correct fountain. Wrong choice deals 1 damage or skip turn.
puzzles.randomize: Shuffle or roll a d4 to decide which fountain is safe each time.

puzzles.title: The Riddle of the Flames
puzzles.setupFlavor: Three braziers line the wall, unlit. A clue says: 'Light me in the order of birth, day, and night.'
puzzles.mechanic: Light them in correct order or get minor flame damage.
puzzles.randomize: Change which brazier is dawn/midday/night each time.

puzzles.title: Jumbled Word Stones
puzzles.setupFlavor: Six stones on a pedestal, each with a letter. They form a word if rearranged properly.
puzzles.mechanic: Arrange to form a D&D-themed word. Three wrong tries triggers a small trap.
puzzles.randomize: Pick a random 4–6 letter word from a list and scramble it each session.

treasures.title: Healing Potion
treasures.easy: Heal 3 HP (baseline).
treasures.medium: Heal 5 HP.
treasures.hard: Heal 6 HP or remove a negative condition.

treasures.title: Greater Healing Potion
treasures.easy: Heal 6 HP (baseline).
treasures.medium: Heal 7 HP.
treasures.hard: Heal 8 HP and draw 1 additional card.

treasures.title: Elixir of Life
treasures.easy: Heal 4 HP + Ressurect fallen players
treasures.medium: Heal 5 HP + Ressurect fallen players
treasures.hard: Heal 7 HP + Ressurect fallen players.

treasures.title: Scroll of Fireball
treasures.easy: Attack 2 to all foes in the next fight (baseline).
treasures.medium: Attack 3 to all foes, discard 1 card after use.
treasures.hard: Attack 4 to all foes and ignore resistances.

treasures.title: Scroll of Bless
treasures.easy: +1 to any Attack or Heal you play (baseline).
treasures.medium: +1 to Attack or Heal, and allow an ally to draw 1 card.
treasures.hard: +2 to Attack or Heal, and no card discard needed.

treasures.title: Ring of Flickering Light
treasures.easy: Force an enemy to discard 1 card once per fight (baseline).
treasures.medium: Force an enemy to discard 1 card and lose their next action.
treasures.hard: Discard 2 cards from the enemy and stun them for a round.

treasures.title: Wand of Sparks
treasures.easy: Attack 1 (free action) once per fight (baseline).
treasures.medium: Attack 2 as a free action.
treasures.hard: Attack 2 with a chance to chain to a second enemy.

treasures.title: Amulet of Shielding
treasures.easy: Ignore the next source of damage (baseline).
treasures.medium: Ignore the next source of damage and heal 1 HP.
treasures.hard: Ignore two sources of damage and reflect 1 damage.

treasures.title: Sword of Embers
treasures.easy: Add +1 damage to an Attack card once per fight (baseline).
treasures.medium: +2 damage and draw a card after use.
treasures.hard: +3 damage and apply burn for ongoing damage.

treasures.title: Bow of True Flight
treasures.easy: Re-draw 1 Attack card if desired.
treasures.medium: Re-draw 1 Attack card and add +3 damage.
treasures.hard: One shot one enemy down (under 10HP).

treasures.title: Staff of Minor Healing
treasures.easy: Heal 1 HP to self or ally once per round.
treasures.medium: Heal 2 HP to self or ally once per round (Discard 1).
treasures.hard: Heal 3 HP to self or ally once per round (Discard 2).

treasures.title: Boots of Haste
treasures.easy: One-time ability to play card again.
treasures.medium: play an extra card and draw another.
treasures.hard: play a card again, play an extra card and draw another.

treasures.title: Cloak of Shadows
treasures.easy: Force an opponent to skip attacking once per fight.
treasures.medium: Skip attack twice per fight (self) and discard 1
treasures.hard: Skip attack twice per fight (group).

treasures.title: Elixir of Clarity
treasures.easy: Draw 2 cards before your turn (baseline).
treasures.medium: Draw 3 cards and discard 1.
treasures.hard: Draw 3 cards with no discard.

treasures.title: Phoenix Down Feather
treasures.easy: If reduced to 0 HP, Heal 3 HP.
treasures.medium: If reduced to 0 HP, Heal 6 HP.
treasures.hard: If reduced to 0 HP, Heal 6 HP, and act immediately.

treasures.title: Lantern of Revealing
treasures.easy: Ignore a forced-discard effect once per fight.
treasures.medium: Ignore and reflect the discard effect onto an enemy.
treasures.hard: Ignore discard and peek at an enemy's hand.

treasures.title: Tome of Knowledge
treasures.easy: Draw 1 card after your turn.
treasures.medium: Draw 2 cards after your turn.
treasures.hard: Draw 2 cards after your turn, play one immediately.

treasures.title: Bracers of Defense
treasures.easy: Reduce incoming Attack by 3 once per fight.
treasures.medium: Reduce by 2 and reflect 2 damage once per fight.
treasures.hard: Reduce all damage by once per fight.

treasures.title: Vial of Acid Splash
treasures.easy: Attack 2 to a single target, ignoring shields.
treasures.medium: Attack 3 with a lingering damage effect (+ 2 next round).
treasures.hard: Attack 4 with splash damage to nearby foes.

treasures.title: Crystal of Foresight
treasures.easy: Peek at the top 2 monster cards and reorder them.
treasures.medium: Peek at the top 3 cards and discard 1.
treasures.hard: Reveal the entire deck and discard 5 cards.

critters.title: Skeleton Rat
critters.flavor: A tiny undead rodent clacking with bony limbs.

critters.title: Zombie Wolf
critters.flavor: A mangy, undead wolf with patches of fur missing.

critters.title: Gray Ooze
critters.flavor: A small glob of acidic slime dissolving anything it touches.

critters.title: Spider
critters.flavor: A gross icky fuzzy little creeper skitters towards you.

critters.title: Broken Skeleton
critters.flavor: A funny little skeleton with legs that dont work right.

critters.title: Animated Armor
critters.flavor: Clunky pieces of armor magically band together and attack.

critters.title: Python
critters.flavor: A big greeen fat snake slithers towards you.

mobs.title: Goblin War Party
mobs.flavor: Ragged, green-skinned warriors armed with rusty blades and shortbows.

mobs.title: Young Kobold
mobs.flavor: Small reptilian creatures yipping orders in a high-pitched language.

mobs.title: Skeleton War Party
mobs.flavor: Skeletons rise up with swords and shields to attack.

miniBosses.title: Cyclops
miniBosses.flavor: A lumbering, one-eyed giant with poor depth perception but massive strength.

miniBosses.title: Stone Giant
miniBosses.flavor: An animated construct of solid rock, slow but nearly impervious to harm.

miniBosses.title: Dark Knight
miniBosses.flavor: A heavily armored warrior corrupted by evil magic, wielding a cursed blade.

miniBosses.title: Ice Giant
miniBosses.flavor: An animated construct of solid ice, cold and brutal.

bosses.title: Red Dragon
bosses.flavor: A colossal, fire-breathing dragon, brimming with arrogance and flames.

bosses.title: Lich Lord
bosses.flavor: An undead sorcerer who wields necromantic power and commands legions of undead.

bosses.title: Black Dragon
bosses.flavor: A colossal, acid-breathing dragon, brimming with arrogance and RAGE.
